name: Jungle Bungle (GD04Hetarth)
description:
A 2D pixel art platformer game.

Game takes place in a fantasy world where you are starting a new adventure to gather more troops and fight strong enemies for glory. Pick up followers along the way and defeat enemy using your superior numbers.

A game that not only tests your responsiveness but also your creativity and math skills. Choose different paths and ways to deal with enemies and win with the highest score possible.

Credits

Project manager

Game & UI programmer

2D Artist

Level Designer

Hetarth Thakor
